snippet.title: Intrepid: New Trailer
snippet.description:
Intrepid is a sci-fi escape room. It will be released by the end of 2018 and available on Windows and Linux.

Story:
You (the protagonist) wake up on a spaceship. Something went wrong and the spaceship is about to explode. You have to get to the escape pod in time or else you will die, like the other crew members ...

Official website:
https://miskatonicstudio.com/
Twitter profile:
https://twitter.com/miskatonic_s
Discord channel:
https://discord.gg/fXqgsMe
